column4: Hi community, I have successfully created a read-write samba share using nautilus, however when other computers put files into that share those files are rw-r--r-- and owned by user "nobody" and group "nogroup" ... I would like for my Ubuntu user to own those files, either directly or via group. How do I do this?
you could check the smb.conf file - and perhaps tweak the share definitions.
